title: Star of ‘Opening Weekend’ Buried Himself with Van Der Poel All Winter: ‘I Never Trained This Hard’
content:
Kuurne-Brussel-Kuurne winner Jasper Philipsen will have major leadout this summer: 'The plan this year is that Groves comes along with me to the Tour'

Read the full article at Star of ‘Opening Weekend’ Buried Himself with Van Der Poel All Winter: ‘I Never Trained This Hard’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
